faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What documents are required to rent a vehicle?
faq.answer1: You need a valid driver's license (at least 1 year old), an ID card or passport, and a valid contact address. Documents will be verified at the time of vehicle pick-up.
faq.question2: How far in advance should I book a vehicle?
faq.answer2: We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance to ensure availability of your desired model. During peak periods, we recommend at least 48-72 hours.
faq.question3: What is included in the rental price?
faq.answer3: The price includes third-party liability insurance, unlimited mileage in Moldova, and a full tank of fuel. Additional insurance and fuel costs are separate.
faq.question4: Can I extend my rental period?
faq.answer4: Yes, you can extend your rental by contacting our team at least 24 hours before the scheduled return date, subject to vehicle availability.
faq.question5: Is delivery to my address available?
faq.answer5: Yes, we offer delivery service within Chisinau municipality. For areas outside the municipality, additional fees may apply depending on distance.

about.title: Trusted Car Rental Services in Moldova
about.intro: Since 2014, W.Rent has been providing professional car rental services in Chisinau. We started with 5 cars and today have a fleet of over 100 vehicles.
about.storyP1: W.Rent was founded in 2014 with a simple goal: to make renting a car in Chisinau as easy as calling a taxi. We started with a small fleet of 5 vehicles and a team of 3 people.
about.storyP2: Over the years, we've grown organically by listening to customer feedback and adapting our services. We were among the first in Moldova to offer no-deposit rental options—a move that transformed the local industry.
about.storyP3: Today, with a fleet of over 100 cars—from economy vehicles to premium SUVs—we serve both individual customers and businesses. Every car undergoes regular inspections, and our support team is available 24/7.
about.storyP4: Our mission remains the same: accessible, transparent, and quality mobility for everyone who needs a vehicle in Moldova.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide us every day and in every interaction with our customers.
about.value1Description: No hidden costs or surprises. The price you see is the price you pay. All terms are clear from the start.
about.value2Description: Our team is available 24/7 for any questions or situations. We're always just a phone call away.
about.value3Description: Every car in our fleet undergoes regular inspections. Clean, well-maintained vehicles ready for the road.
about.value4Description: Delivery to your address in Chisinau, flexible rental periods, and no-deposit options for your convenience.
about.ctaSubtitle: Choose from our fleet of over 100 cars and be on the road in less than 2 hours.
about.missionText: To provide accessible and quality car rental services
about.reason4Text: Dedicated team available around the clock

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.section1P1: These Terms and Conditions govern the relationship between W.Rent SRL (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") and the person renting the vehicle (hereinafter referred to as "the Customer").
terms.section1P2: By making a reservation or signing the rental agreement, the Customer fully accepts these terms.
terms.section1P3: The Company reserves the right to modify these terms with prior notification to customers.
terms.section2P2: Minimum driving experience: 1 year from obtaining driver's license.
terms.section2P3: Required documents: valid driver's license, ID card or passport, valid contact address.
terms.section2P4: The Customer must present original documents at the time of vehicle pick-up.
terms.section3P1: Reservations can be made online, by phone, or at the company's office.
terms.section3P2: The rental price includes: third-party liability insurance, unlimited mileage within the Republic of Moldova, and a full tank of fuel.
terms.section3P3: Payment is made at vehicle pick-up in cash, by bank transfer, or by bank card (Visa/Mastercard).
terms.section3P4: Free cancellation is possible with a minimum of 24 hours before the pick-up date.
terms.section4P1: For certain vehicles in the fleet, rentals are made without a guarantee (deposit). These vehicles are marked accordingly.
terms.section4P2: For vehicles that require a guarantee, the deposit is fully refunded when the car is returned in proper condition.
terms.section4P3: The amount of the guarantee varies depending on the vehicle category and is communicated before signing the contract.
terms.section5P1: The vehicle may only be used within the territory of the Republic of Moldova, unless otherwise agreed in writing.
terms.section5P2: It is prohibited to use the vehicle: in racing, for transporting hazardous materials, under the influence of prohibited substances, for subletting.
terms.section5P3: The Customer is responsible for complying with traffic rules and paying fines.
terms.section5P4: Smoking in the vehicle is prohibited. Cleaning fee: €50.
terms.section6P1: The vehicle must be returned on the date and time agreed in the contract, at the specified location.
terms.section6P2: Late returns are charged at the full daily rate for each additional day.
terms.section6P3: The vehicle must be returned with a full tank of fuel. Otherwise, a refueling fee plus a service charge will be applied.
terms.section6P4: Any damage found upon return that was not documented at pick-up is the Customer's responsibility.
terms.section7P1: All vehicles are insured with valid third-party liability insurance (RCA).
terms.section7P2: In case of an accident, the Customer must immediately contact the police and the Company.
terms.section7P3: The Customer is responsible for the deductible specified in the insurance contract, if the accident was their fault.
terms.section7P4: Additional comprehensive (CASCO) insurance is available at extra cost.
terms.section8P1: Any disagreements will be resolved amicably.
terms.section8P2: If an amicable solution cannot be reached, disputes will be resolved by the competent courts of the Republic of Moldova.
terms.section8P3: The applicable law is the legislation of the Republic of Moldova.

privacy.title: Privacy & Cookie Policy
privacy.section1P1: W.Rent SRL (hereinafter referred to as "W.Rent", "we") respects the confidentiality of your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.section1P2: This policy applies to all visitors to the wrent.md website and customers who use our car rental services.
privacy.section2P1: Identification data: first name, last name, phone number, email address.
privacy.section2P2: Document data: driver's license series and number, ID card/passport series and number.
privacy.section2P3: Technical data: IP address, browser type, pages visited on our website, cookies.
privacy.section2P4: Payment data: bank card information is securely processed through our payment provider and is not stored on our servers.
privacy.section3P2: Communicating with you regarding reservations, modifications, or cancellations.
privacy.section3P4: Complying with legal obligations (tax reporting, contract records).
privacy.section3P5: Sending offers and news only with your explicit consent.
privacy.section4P1: Our website uses cookies to ensure proper functionality and to analyze traffic.
privacy.section4P2: Essential cookies: necessary for website operation. Cannot be disabled.
privacy.section4P3: Analytics cookies: help us understand how the website is used. They are anonymized.
privacy.section4P4: Marketing cookies: used to display relevant advertisements. Only activated with your consent.
privacy.section4P5: You can manage cookie preferences from your browser settings.
privacy.section5P1: We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.
privacy.section5P2: Data may be shared with: insurance companies (in case of accidents), public authorities (upon legal request), IT service providers (hosting, email) who comply with equivalent security standards.
privacy.section5P3: All third-party companies we work with have contractual obligations to protect your data.
privacy.section6P1: Right of access: you can request a copy of the data we hold about you.
privacy.section6P2: Right to rectification: you can request correction of inaccurate data.
privacy.section6P3: Right to erasure: you can request deletion of data, except those required for legal obligations.
privacy.section6P4: Right to portability: you can request transfer of data to another operator.
privacy.section6P5: Right to object: you can refuse data processing for marketing purposes.
privacy.section6P6: To exercise these rights, contact us at office@wrent.md.
privacy.section7P1: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect data: encrypted connections (SSL/TLS), restricted database access, periodic security audits.
privacy.section7P2: In the event of a security breach, we will notify the competent authorities and affected individuals in accordance with applicable legislation.
privacy.section8P1: Personal data is kept for the duration of the contractual relationship and for a period of 5 years thereafter, in accordance with legal tax requirements.
privacy.section8P2: Technical data (cookies, logs) is kept for a maximum of 12 months.
privacy.section8P3: Upon expiration of the retention period, data is deleted or anonymized.
